item.title: Ticket #1520 (Admin panel USER section bug) updated
item.dc:creator: AkeB0N0
item.description:
Below the capabilities.php code details...

PS : I forgot tell you, my version is 1.5.1.3 

		//Build $allcaps from role caps, overlay user's $caps
		$this->allcaps = array();
		foreach($this->roles as $role => $value) {
			$role = $wp_roles->get_role($role);
			$this->allcaps = array_merge($this->allcaps, $role->capabilities);
		}
		$this->allcaps = array_merge($this->allcaps, $this->caps);
	}

item.title: Ticket #1521 (Javascript unescaped quote mark) created
item.dc:creator: 0ink
item.description:
Easiest to show example: onclick="return confirm('You are about to delete this post \'It's all Retro\'\n \'OK\' to delete, \'Cancel\' to stop.')"

In Firefox it's ok, but in IE the ' in It's (It's) causes an error because the ' is picked up as an unescaped . This occurs in the Manage Posts section when post titles have a single quote in them.

item.title: Ticket #1520 (Admin panel USER section bug) created
item.dc:creator: AkeB0N0
item.description:
I get it this error message into admin panel user section (both your profile and Author & Users)

Error Code : 

Warning: array_merge() [function.array-merge]: Argument #2 is not an array in c:\Inetpub\wwwroot\WP\wp-includes\capabilities.php on line 141

PS : I was update it capabilities.php and function.php files from trunk builds, but it's not solved my problem.

item.title: Ticket #1519 (RSS Update Frequency) created
item.dc:creator: damonlh
item.description:
Add an option to the administration panel to allow the update frequency to be customized for RSS feeds displayed on the site.

The value is set in: "wp-includes/rss-functions.php" as $MAX_AGE (or $MAGPIE_CACHE_AGE ??)

Some people may want the feeds to update more or less frequently.
